content: knit a cute christmas **dress and santa hat** for barbie & 11 5 inch fashion dolls with ** straight needles 1 ** or ** knit in the round 2 ** circular or dpns - free patterns on my blog with ads use **4-ply or sport red** yarn or light **baby dk** yarn would work too you also need small bits of **fluffy white** snowflake/teddy yarn - any weight from **dk to chunky** should work > **premium pattern version** for sale on ravelry > includes > > * full pdf pattern with photos 11 pages > * short text only pdf pattern for easy printing 3 pages > * priority pattern support > get 25% off when you buy any 2 > patterns no coupon needed or join > my mailing list 3 for 20% off all > patterns 1 https //www craftfix com/barbie-christmas-santa-dress-knitting-pattern/ 2 https //www craftfix com/barbie-christmas-knitting-pattern-circular/ 3 https //www craftfix com/newsletter
